name: Copper Canyon Adventure Park
description:
Introduction

Highly rated adventure park in Copper Canyon, having a via ferrata and a zip line circuit. One of the ziplines is 2.5km, reported to be the second longest in the world. All of the activities appear to be guided and have an additional fee.

Parque Barrancas
